## Icon.setVisible() method

Show or hide the icon.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setVisible(_visible: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_visible | boolean | True if the icon should be visible. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
